name: Garbo: Quest of Something??
description:
You play as GARBY, an octopus(?) on a mission to save the world from evil.

With over 1 world to explore, at least 3 items, and a lot(not a lot) of unique(the same) NPCs there's nothing stopping you
from banishing the SERPENT OF CONFUSION and saving the world!

  • Features:
    - Gameboy style puke-green color scheme (kinda?)!
    - Mazes!
    - Time-lords!
    - Useless items!
    - Stuff that doesn't make sense!
    - Humor!
    - We need to get the word count up!

Dev note:
This game is more of a practice game for me, 
just to make something working and to practice my skills before I make a big project.
I mean if you like it that's cool, I might update it after the initial release, 
but don't yell at me if it's broken.
